    Package Description

    • Uses of Hbar in com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk

      Fields in com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk declared as Hbar 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Hbar Transfer.amount 
      static Hbar Hbar.MAX
      Singleton value for the maximum (positive) value this wrapper may contain.
      static Hbar Hbar.MIN
      Singleton value for the minimum (negative) value this wrapper may contain.
      static Hbar Hbar.ZERO
      Singleton value representing zero hbar.
      Methods in com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk that return Hbar 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Hbar Hbar.from(BigDecimal amount, HbarUnit unit)
      Calculate an hbar amount given a value and a unit to interpret it as.
      static Hbar Hbar.from(long amount, HbarUnit unit)
      Calculate an hbar amount given a value and a unit to interpret it as.
      static Hbar Hbar.fromTinybar(long amount)
      Wrap an amount of tinybar; not to be confused with of(long).
      static Hbar Hbar.of(BigDecimal amount)
      Wrap a possibly fractional amount of hbar.
      static Hbar Hbar.of(long amount)
      Wrap some amount of hbar.
      Methods in com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk with parameters of type Hbar 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Hbar.compareTo(Hbar o) 
      T QueryBuilder.setMaxQueryPayment(Hbar maxPayment) 
      Client Client.setMaxQueryPayment(Hbar maxQueryPayment)
      Set the maximum default payment allowable for queries.
      Client Client.setMaxTransactionFee(Hbar maxTransactionFee)
      Set the maximum fee to be paid for transactions executed by this client.
      T TransactionBuilder.setMaxTransactionFee(Hbar fee)
      Sets the maximum fee that the client is willing to pay to execute this transaction, which is split between the network and the node.
      T QueryBuilder.setPaymentAmount(Hbar paymentAmount)
      Deprecated. 
      renamed to #setQueryPayment() for consistency with #setMaxQueryPayment().
      T QueryBuilder.setQueryPayment(Hbar paymentAmount)
      Explicitly specify that the operator account is paying for the query; when the query is executed a payment transaction will be constructed with a transfer of this amount from the operator account to the node which will handle the query.

    • Uses of Hbar in com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.account

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CryptoTransferTransaction CryptoTransferTransaction.addRecipient(AccountId recipientId, Hbar value)
      Add a party to the transfer who will have currency credited to their account by this transfer.
      CryptoTransferTransaction CryptoTransferTransaction.addSender(AccountId senderId, Hbar value)
      Add a party to the transfer who will have currency withdrawn from their account to add to the transfer.
      AccountCreateTransaction AccountCreateTransaction.setInitialBalance(Hbar initialBalance)
      Set the initial balance of the account, transferred from the operator account.

    • Uses of Hbar in com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.contract

      Methods in com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.contract with parameters of type Hbar 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContractCreateTransaction ContractCreateTransaction.setInitialBalance(Hbar intialBalance)
      Set the initial balance that will be transferred from the operator's account to the new contract's internal crypto account before the constructor is called.
      ContractExecuteTransaction ContractExecuteTransaction.setPayableAmount(Hbar amount)
      Set the amount of hbar that will be paid from the operator account to the function being invoked.
